website_summaries.verdict: While not a professional-level kit, it has a lot to offer for a low price, including a decent warranty and responsive customer care.
pros: Affordable, and comes with lots of video/photography equipment that includes 2 umbrellas, 3 stands, and a carrying case
Easy to set up, plus stands and umbrellas are easy to adjust
cons: Light is only 5500 Kelvin and not adjustable
Some reports of burned-out bulbs and faulty sockets

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: Let me first start by saying I'm not a professional photographer. I use a Nikon D7000 with this setup to photograph my artwork and am getting the best results ever. I used to shoot my work in a small light tent kit, but now that I paint much larger works, needed a larger setup. Everything arrived in excellent condition, it was well packaged and nothing was broken, torn, or dented. It's fully adjustable and I am really, really pleased with this purchase. Am still learning how to capture subtle nuances with the textures in my paintings, but gone are the blown highlights and hot spots. Thanks for making an affordable kit available, that isn't "cheesy".
customer_reviews.author: The Debs

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I am here re-doing my review, I had issues with the umbrella and thought it was broken, but tried again this afternoon and the umbrella opened normally, perhaps I was too frustrated when I was trying. But nevertheless works great! Also I was contacted by the seller promptly which was very friendly and offered suggestions on my issues. I sure recommend this product due to the quality and customer service by the seller. Thank you to amazon and the seller. Great experience!
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set Excellent Price! AMAZING COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: I love this set for the price! It is easy to set up and take down. It is bright enough for making videos. It’s a great little set and I’m super happy with this purchase! ***UPDATE*** Two bulbs that came with the kit were flickering and not working well. I contacted ESDDI and they sent me two new bulbs, free and they were on my doorstep within two days! Very friendly and they stand by their product. Will definitely purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Dana Groom

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality! Got Free gift, Fast Shipping, Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible set! It includes big heavy-duty BRIGHT bulbs, the 3 stands, and the 2 umbrellas with a carrying case. I bought it for my stepson's Youtube videos and it instantly and dramatically improved the quality of his shots so much! Fantastic price, super fast shipping, and incredible product! Thank you for selling a high-quality product at such a low price! UPDATE months later I even got a free gift which was a really high-quality table phone holder that my other son needed too! Really like this company and they have kind quick customer service. Still holds up great and it has taken a lot of traveling now!
customer_reviews.author: Tia

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a week. Like everyone says, it is easy to put together and easy to use. I had one part that didn't work correctly and was worried I would have to send in the whole thing (I wanted to use the other 2 lights right away). When I contacted the seller, they made things very easy and last night I got a full replacement! Wow, I wish all of my problems were this easy to solve.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Whigham

customer_reviews.title: appears to be a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that we are not professional photographers by no means. We were looking for some lights to try making our own boudoir photos. The lights arrived timely, they included three stands, two umbrellas and three light kits with a carrying case. The lights seemed to have really provided the lighting we were looking for. They were bright enough without being overpowering and with the types of bulbs provided, they did not overheat the small space we used them in. It was a bit odd that there were three stands and lights, but only two umbrellas, but that was fine for us as two were enough for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra and Brian

customer_reviews.title: No discernible difference
customer_reviews.text: The kit was easy to set up. There was a little booklet with a one-page visual guide for set up, but there were no instructions for use. Before using I watched several YouTube how-to videos for proper set up, distance from subject, umbrella distance from light bulb, etc... and saw no discernible difference between pictures I took with the regular lighting in the room, and those using the light kit. Also, the cords were not long enough, even shooting on the narrow wall of a 10 x 12 room with outlets on either side I was stretching the cords to the max.
customer_reviews.author: panjatty

customer_reviews.title: A+ Experience all around! Great company and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the amount of light and versatility I am getting from this kit. Quality is great for the price point. I did have a problem with one of the bulbs .. and the company (ESDDI) who makes and sells this product was VERY helpful and fast in getting in touch with me to solve the issue. Recommended product and company. Update: This company is fantastic. They've kept in touch with me and offered to help multiple times. I'm now using one of their brighter bulbs with this umbrella kit and getting great results! Image shown was taken with ESDDI Umbrella kit
customer_reviews.author: Creative GameLife

customer_reviews.title: Good but need to work on the umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really love the lighting kit but my biggest gripe would be with the umbrellas. Not even a couple of days into using it and a couple of the spindles broke. I was so upset by this but decided to keep it and not complain anyone (except for this review) Other than that I would say the quality of the materials are really good except for the umbrellas which they seriously need to work on. I do think that it is a good price but be gentle with the umbrella equipment.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Great basic, no frills, light duty
customer_reviews.text: I needed light diffusers for shooting video auditions, and these simple basic light umbrellas were perfect. I don't travel with them, they stay set up and just move from one room to the next. And they work perfectly. I may upgrade the bulbs to bulbs that have a higher lumen value, to increase the light output, but these are working great. Easy to set up and use, they provide the perfect indirect lighting wash to eliminate shadows and harsh lighting in my videos. Great results for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: J Sumner

customer_reviews.title: Light build quality, Good for the novice, good price overall
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the price and to use during family portrait time. I am a novice photographer but was able to put them to good use. The metal is pretty thin and the umbrellas are fragile but with some care you can get these to provide good service. I recommend these for the overall price to value. the storage bag made the difference. everything packs away nice and compactly.
customer_reviews.author: WeegieB

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: For $40 this was an excellent purchase and well worth the $40! First off, it was packed extremely well and nothing was damage during shipping. Second, the quality seems very good and sturdy and not cheaply built and third, it was very easy to setup. Finally, the company seems to genuinely care about their customer and was checking in to see if everything was alright and that it arrived safely and if I needed any parts that may have gotten damaged in shipping. I highly recommend this company and this lighting kit if you're first starting out with studio quality lighting, like me, for pictures or video. It is well worth the $40!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome product
customer_reviews.text: So glad I ordered this 3 piece light kit. I was a little overwhelmed just looking at all the boxes to assemble. I simply unwrapped and looked at the photos in the user manual. I was able to assemble all 3 items with ease and stress free. Super simple no tools required. If you’re on the fence don’t hesitate and grab this phenomenal kit ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Really elevated my video setup
customer_reviews.text: Wow! These were affordable and really elevated my video setup. Take a look at the pictures!
customer_reviews.author: Jassimine

customer_reviews.title: Included bulbs are dim, can’t upgrade them
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine. When I decided to purchase this, I knew I’d need brighter lightbulbs, as the ones provided are not very bright. So I purchased some 100 watt led bulbs from target, but unfortunately they will not work in these lights. They screw in fine, but just don’t turn on. I tried the 100 watt bulbs in a different lamp I have, and they worked perfectly fine. So basically, don’t buy these if you’re expecting to upgrade the bulbs like I was.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this product. As someone just starting out, I don’t want to pay high dollar prices for equipment just yet. When I found these lights I was super excited! They are very professional looking, easy to set up, and easy to use. Plus the carry bag makes lugging everything super simple and easy! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Nice, affordable lighting set.
customer_reviews.text: I am an artist and I like to photograph my own work with a real camera (as opposed to an Iphone camera). This set is surprisingly useful and affordable. I got everything I need for under $50. Now I would not recommend buying this set if I was traveling a lot with it. But for the price and my own little home photography setup it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lights and stands
customer_reviews.text: If you go into this knowing that a single CFL bulb isn't going to let you shoot at 1/1000 a second, it is a fine lighting kit for a small price. I used it today to backup my LEDs for a girl-on-motorcycle shoot today. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: OutdoorPhotoMan

customer_reviews.title: Beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: If you’re just starting with photography like myself these lights are going to be your bestfriend. It took me a while to understand how lighting works but these lights are easy to understand, easy to put together and they are perfect for iPhone photography!
customer_reviews.author: Tacheline

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after one use....
customer_reviews.text: After using it once for a photo shoot, I set it aside for a month and a half now one of the light fixtures won’t turn on. Needed it today, never thought I’d have to worry about a light fixture. I tried multiple working bulbs and outlets, but the light fixture just won’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: isaiah17_7

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting set and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is my first set of photography lights. I found them easy to set up and works perfect. One lightbulb was shot, so I emailed the company who responded within the hour. They shipped a new light bulb to me that same day as a replacement. Was very impressed with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: This product is of good value. The whole set has three light bulbs, three small brackets, and the small brackets that satisfy my tiny shots. This kit meets almost all the requirements for my indoor shooting. At first, I was worried that I could not install it. It turns out that after about three minutes, all settings have been set. Finally, the delivered bag has adequate storage.
customer_reviews.author: cola1996

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Bought to use for head shots. Works as intended. Wished one of the bulbs was a bit brighter but that was easy to fix. Fairly easy to set up and break down. Compact carrying case. Light weight and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lighting set to take pictures of my paintings and portraits. I find it very easy to assemble or disassemble, and it comes with light bulbs and a bag already. I bought it during a sale, and for what it’s worth, it has a lot of value. A very great accessory for beginner photographers. It gets the job done! The only issue I have is that the metals on the “white umbrellas” can be somewhat malleable, so don’t lock and twist too hard or else the spot can be out of shape. Overall I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Chan

customer_reviews.title: Great lighting kit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this light kit for awhile now and it’s very bright makes my pics look amazing. Comes with a carry bag. Umbrellas are easy to remove and height of the light is also easy to adjust. I just wish it came with more spare bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Katheryn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: The difference between my Instagram photos before and after this product are amazing. The product was easy to setup and easy to pack up and take with me. It comes in a small carrying case that I can toss in the trunk and the light it outputs is unbelievable. Thanks for making such an affordable and well made product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew + Denise

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: This product came exactly as described. It came earlier than expected, so that was a nice surprise. I read one review about the light bulbs not being bright enough, but that is inaccurate. When you're physically looking at them you might question it, but if you actually take a pic with them - they're incredible, and what's best is that they don't blind you! I would recommend to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: tiffany walsh-paxson

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This package is great for the price, and it’s a good set for beginners. The equipment in the kit have good quality. I wish the light can be brighter though, I plan to buy brighter bulbs th replace those in the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take a picture
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome umbrella photography light, especially for amateurs like myself. I was mainly doing pictures of my families and needed good lighting. This product comes with 2xWhite umbrellas,3xLight bulbs,3xLight Stands,3xLight Switch,1xCarry Bag,User Manual. The set up was simple and easy to do. You can adjust the height and angle of the umbrella lights. You can also do the same for the single free standing one. Everything looks just like the picture included. It gave good lighting and looks very professional after set up. I will share the link with everyone that ask
customer_reviews.author: nian

customer_reviews.title: Worked out just right!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this kit because I could not afford to take my daughter to a studio to have professional pics done. The shoot turned out excellent. I shot it right in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Keeya Norris

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was going to be great...but fail
customer_reviews.text: The set seems great at first...but during my first 10 minutes, I blew two light bulbs, one of the umbrellas will not stay open, screws on one of the tripods stripped so it will not stay elevated...and the zipper on the bag broke. I had high hopes, but they were dashed. ****update*** What awesome customer service. They have already shipped me a new set. I will DEFINITELY do business with them again!!!
customer_reviews.author: mitchell l. chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for Any Portrait Photographer
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic lighting kit for photos, especially if you are just starting out. It’s easy to assemble and only takes me a few minutes to set up. The light stands are lightweight but still durable, and the bag makes the kit easy to carry and very portable, so it’s good if you are constantly shooting in different locations. The included bulbs work well for portraiture, and the umbrellas soften light nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Two of the three lights don’t work. I’m returning and will hopefully find some that work from somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Terie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to take some photos at the home to add more lighting. They are easy to assemble and work great! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Great light setup for a newbie!
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to photography and lighting set up. This light set is easy and fast to put together and perfect for taking pics in any room with limited lighting. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: LMRTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Weak light
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to take pictures of products for sale online . The stands and cords are all satisfactory but the lights themselves cast a very weak beam and is not really helping illuminate my products like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Bought these to take my baby’s photos and they are awesome! Great price. I love how it comes with the bulbs and a bag for storage. I highly recommend these for your professional looking photos whether your a photographer or just want to take your own photos. I did have a small problem with one of the stands but they took care of it right away. Amazing customer service. Don’t pass up this great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lighting looks great
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to put together and I like how it comes with a bag to perfectly organize the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great value-- gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed. I had a small photoshoot in someone's home and it was easy to set up and move around. Definitely great for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Everything came well packed and the three 45W bulbs were intact in their styrofoam protective padding in their seperate boxes. Small but detailed Umbrella Lighting Kit User Manual included.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install. I wish that there was a 4-bulb umbrella light. This design only has a single bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Happyhome

customer_reviews.title: Great but easy to knock over
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners just a little on the flimsy side as in they’re easy to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Allison I. Marcoz

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners/ very easy to us
customer_reviews.text: I love this set it’s very easy to put together and take apart/ and travel with. I would recommend these lights for small spaces. Larger spaces with more natural light would be god as well! Definitely am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kaley

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this lighting set. I'm using it for continuous light photography. I did have to buy brighter bulbs because the space where I'm using this set was still too dark.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice, good quality and excellent price. They get the job done and I really appreciate the 3rd light. It all fits nicely in the bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level lighting kit.
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level lighting kit. Easy to assemble, lots of flexibility with adjustable light angles. The cords could be a bit longer, but not a huge issue. I like how portable the kit is, even come with a bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife and she absolutely loves them! They have made a huge difference with her photography and videos! Absolutely great purchase for beginners without a doubt and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super happy!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with everything that came in this kit I totally recommend it to any one looking for lighting for their photography.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic part on one of the umbrellas was broken. Also, as you can see on the picture, the cloth on umbrella is not sewn properly, looks very messy. Not sure how long it can last. I believe, for the price I paid I could expect a little more quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel&Nataly

customer_reviews.title: Good for taking product photos
customer_reviews.text: Good lighting for me as a beginner, I only use this to take product photos.
customer_reviews.author: Laysie

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to any Home Studio
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first kit as a new photographer. Understanding the necessity of light with the use of your camera is key, in being a good photographer. My kit came with 3 stands/2 umbrellas and 3 45W 5500K light bulbs and a carrying case. This kit was made to be used portable. It was super easy to assemble and I like that it fit my price range. I am truly satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica N. Thorpe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Use this to light me up to run ManyCam to teach online. Works great. Lights me up! Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The wife uses this product for taking photos of merchandise. She loves it and it helps her take great pics!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Nah
customer_reviews.text: 1. A lousy bulb which burned out on day 1. 2. A lousy socket which can barely hold bulbs without wobbling around, worrying me it's going to catch the thing on fire. 3. Shoddy construction of the entire equipment package. Spend a few extra dollars and do yourself one better.
customer_reviews.author: "Goat"

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights. My pictures have turned out great with these lights! Easy to use for beginners!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect set up! Easy to use. Everything came in seperate safe packages. Nothing was broken (that's always a plus!) Customer service is super friendly as well! I'm not sure about low lighting, the bulbs that come with it are really bright white light. It's perfect for portraits or just lighting up the room.
customer_reviews.author: Kinky_Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I use this for resale photos. Does a nice job at a great price. Lightweight and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Bartow

customer_reviews.title: Good stands, weak lights
customer_reviews.text: The stands are fine, but the lights aren't bright enough at all. I recommend replacing them with high lumen LED.
customer_reviews.author: Neux Products

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great and totally worth the price. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff O.

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot. Kind of flimsy but for the price - it is great
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: More a kids themed birthday than pro’s
customer_reviews.text: These are in no way professional use and more for looks! Fun for kids
customer_reviews.author: Robb R.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't actually shot photos yet, but this product is very easy to assemble and disassemble; which was important to me. It's also light enough to carry in the carrying bag that it comes in. It's delivered well packed with parts boxed individually and there's a personable email sent to you encouraging any questions or feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Melanin Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great compact lighting kit
customer_reviews.text: We needed something fast to shoot pic for Furniture for a Catalog. This was easy to set up and use. The bulbs are well packed and can travel in the bag and they will not get broken .
customer_reviews.author: MARY E. MCCAULEY

customer_reviews.title: Good light, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Item was receive within days of ordering new and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 point lighting
customer_reviews.text: I love this 3 point lighting. It’s great! Very easy to assemble and the lighting is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bulbs on sticks
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it should be more than a bulb on a very light stick. Quite flimsy and falls over very easily. The fact that the bulb is open and unprotected means I already broke two in a week. If the umbrellas are attached the bulbs won't break but they do fall over very easily due to being off balance. Not a very good experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works well for the money but umbrella rods are a bit thin but holding up so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this product. After reading other reviews I was worried it would be a cheaply made product. Happy to say it is not! Highly recommend for great portable lighting gear.
customer_reviews.author: D.g.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great "starter kit" for a beginner. Easy to assemble and well packaged. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Eliza Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Dramatic effects for the wrong reason
customer_reviews.text: Used several times and they worked well, but then I turned one on and the bulb literally exploded! Glass and whatever the white powdery stuff is in the spiral bulbs went all over my set. Not sure if it's an isolated bulb problem or a wiring problem in the light, but I don't plan to keep using this kit, it makes me nervous now.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Professional and as a hobby you need lights
customer_reviews.text: A good system for putting more light on a subject. I would have like a longer electrical cords.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D. Clifton

customer_reviews.title: great value for you$
customer_reviews.text: I shopped around a lot for my Photography lights. FINALLY these work great, can highly recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: new vision international llc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the low price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up! It’s so easy, you don’t even need the instructions that come with it! I purchased this for my reselling business and it works perfect for it. For what you get, and the low-cost, it is more than worth it! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jetco Inc

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: The quality is good. It comes in an organized boxes with a carrier bag. It’s very easy to setup and not too many pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Brandom

customer_reviews.title: Makes my photos better
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to move. It balances the white light and makes my pics so much more professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Umbrellas are a little fragile and bend easily but for the money this is an excellent package. I use it for my clothing sales.
customer_reviews.author: s matheny

customer_reviews.title: Too bulky
customer_reviews.text: Not enough for what I was looking for, had to return
customer_reviews.author: Aman

customer_reviews.title: Love the items
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price, not the better quality but its good for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner light kit
customer_reviews.text: Love set just wish there were good directions as to setting lights for shadows and such.
customer_reviews.author: Jenene S. Horner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and high-quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this photography lighting kit! Shipping was fast and it came packaged nicely. Lighting stands were easy to assemble and instructions were helpful! I put all 3 together in less then 5m and they are high quality!! Great for the price. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: I love these lights, I thought they were going to be broken or not working from the other reviews but it was the total opposite, was just like the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: You need to purchase you won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Omg I am so happy I purchase this. I don’t have to pay no more photographers because I can do it myself Thank you again
customer_reviews.author: MsDontPlayWithMe

customer_reviews.title: I Love the lighting kit
customer_reviews.text: Your product was perfect in every way!!! works great, my problem is with amazon shipping. I also ordered a 1# bag of calcium carbonate. they stuffed it into a larger box with the lighting kit. It arrived with a hole in the bag &1/2 # of powder all over the light kit and my kitchen,,, an absolute mess to clean up
customer_reviews.author: linda fortunato

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for video recording and photographing...Really effective and simple to set up and use...The customer service was special....really effective and ready to help and find solution...After I bought my set,I broke one light,they sent me another one for free...Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: kalonji

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to set up and get going. The third small light is a nice addition to this package. It's also nice that it all fits inside the carrying case, both for storage and transport. The color of the light produced is very natural.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wonderly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: I love the umbrella lighting I use it for my lives so people can see my Jewelry better and also for when I am photographing the jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: They will do but cords are short. Otherwise they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J Andrade

customer_reviews.title: Really really cheap :(
customer_reviews.text: Wow, was this made cheaply. First the design is bad. the base can't take the heavy to so it falls over easily. I kinda expected that, but what I didn't expect was the first time it fell over the stand was such cheap material that it bent. Now it's even worse. The worst.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Newage

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for the price! The lighting is perfect for videos. I had a issue with 2 of my bulbs during transit and they sent me out a new kit right away! Very professional thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, cheap, terrible products
customer_reviews.text: You couldn't pay me enough money to write a positive review about this setup. Save your money and use a flashlight from your cellphone instead of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: A great lighting set
customer_reviews.text: It works a lot better than expected! Super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to build a portrait room at home, and now I have ESDDI Photography Umbrella to realize my dream. The ESDDI Photography Umbrella is easy to use. The collection volume is also small. The photos used it are soft and beautiful. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: light bulbs fuse
customer_reviews.text: the product is easy to assemble and simple to use, but the light bulbs fused immediately after turning the lights on. quite disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sisamkele Flatela

customer_reviews.title: Great setup for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Packed well, very easy to assemble, sturdy bases with plenty of adjustable heights, nice length cords on lights, comes with carry tote, 100% satisfied with the quality of this product for the price! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not dimmable
customer_reviews.text: They are not dimmable but they are nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Dave Apotheosis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lighting
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect. Easy to install and the lighting is great! I was able to take great shots of my products.
customer_reviews.author: Purity Smiles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Great for my kids who want to start a YouTube channel. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These umbrellas are great. I highly recommend them. I teach English online, and these lights are perfect for my clsssriom. The light is bright, even and consistent. The umbrellas help so I am not staring into lights all morning. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, easy for essemble and very good quality. Perfect for my projects. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does it’s job perfect and it was definitely a great price but I got it on sale
customer_reviews.author: tricia

product_meta.title: ESDDI Softbox Lighting Kit Professional Continuous Lighting with 900W 5400K E27 Socket and 2 White Reflectors 30 x 30 inch
feature_bullets: 💚PROFESSIONAL ：ESDDI 33 X 33 inches lighting diffuses light, weaken light shadows, make model portrait and product shooting softer and more delicate. Concentrate on adding light in specific area for delicate details, can get ideal lighting effect by using with common softbox

💚Adjustable Stand & 210° Rotatable Head: The stable aluminum alloy tripod can be easily assemble from 68cm to 192 cm to suit different needing. 210° rotatable head provides an alternative way for different work and very stable.
💚Good Material: High quality inner patterns reflect a much brighter light, maintains good reflection performance. Durable white silk covers provide soft and uniform light.
